title: Kohler 2714-4-G9 Bryant 18-7/8" Circular Vitreous China Drop In Bathroom Sink with Overflow and 3 Faucet Holes at 4" Centers
item_description:
Kohler 2714-4-G9 Bryant 18-7/8" Circular Vitreous China Drop In Bathroom Sink with Overflow and 3 Faucet Holes at 4" Centers

  • Seller States: SandBar Finish - Retail Over $200!!
  • Overall Length: 18-7/8" (left to right of sink)
  • Overall Width: 18-7/8" (front to back of sink)
  • Overall Height: 7-5/8" (top to bottom of sink)
  • Basin Length: 12-1/2" (left to right of basin)
  • Basin Width: 16-5/16" (front to back of basin)
  • Basin Depth: 7-5/8" (top to bottom of basin)
  • Faucet Centers: 4" (distance between outer faucet holes)
  • Drain Connection Size: 1-3/4"
  • Faucet Hole Size: 1-1/4"
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 3
